q: Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla.-- were pleased to have the chance to see Gabrielle Giffords . When the lawmakers entered the hospital room, Gabrielle Giffords was with her The doctor , her parents and her husband. We were telling her how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "Then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do when she got better. We were holding her hand, and she was responding to our hand-holding,

strategic projects and new products with the title of co-founder. "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt said of himself, Page and Sergey Brin . This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt announced leaving the CEO post as Google announced its fourth quarter earnings, which saw fourth quarter revenue of$ 8.44 billion, an increase of 26 percent over the year prior.
